Title: Establishes the New York children's COVID-19 fund program
Summary: Establishes the New York COVID-19 children's fund program to provide assistance to children whose parent, custodian, legal guardian, or related adult household member died as a result of contracting COVID-19, regardless of immigration status of such children.
LawCode: Add Art 19-J §§535 - 535-b, Exec L; add §78-c, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York children's COVID-19 fund program
